recent_events.title: 10th National Scout Jamboree 2024
recent_events.description: Kingswood Scouts gathered in front of their ingenious campsite entrance, fashioned after a buzzing bee hive. Their teamwork and creativity are the nectar that sweetens the 10th National Scout Jamboree 2024 experience in Trincomalee, Sri Lanka.

recent_events.title: 110 Years of Kingswood Scouting
recent_events.description: Celebrating legacy. We honor the enduring legacy of Kingswood Scouts, a tradition built on courage, dedication, and the values that shape future leaders in every way.
